attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Wouldn't it be good if all the doom and gloom was replaced once a year with a good news day...

All news reports would have to be about something good that has happened and the newspapers must be involved as well...

It would be interesting to see the countries collective spirit lift and everyone was happy for a day...

Hopefully this could escalate and become a more often occurrence...

You would leave your house smiling and of course if people see you smile they smile too...

Imagine the knock on effect...
